[I re-quantified samples for Zymo whole genome bisulfite sequencing (WGBS) project 3534 earlier today](https://robertslab.github.io/sams-notebook/2020/09/01/DNA-Quantification-Re-quant-Ronits-C.gigas-Diploid-Triploid-Ctenidia-gDNA-Submitted-to-ZymoResearch.html) due to ZymoResearch indicating there was insufficient DNA for most of the samples and submitted an additional 1ug of each sample.
